title: 3.3 Master Challenge 2
question:
◼ Create a web page named My Subjects.
◼ Set the top margin and left margin of the web page to 100.
◼ Set the background color of the web page to blue.
◼ Write the names of any five favorite subjects of yours using different heading levels. Write a paragraph about each of the subjects.
◼ Choose a different color for each subject.

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
